air_strike.title: Air Strike
air_strike.description: Automated airstrike system. Spawns rockets at randomized intervals, heights, and trajectories over predefined map locations with player warnings.

ammo_resupply.title: Ammo Resupply
ammo_resupply.description: Players receive extra ammunition periodically or on demand.

april_fools_chat.title: April Fools - Chat
april_fools_chat.description: Funny or mischievous chat triggered for April Fools.

april_fools_word_shuffler.title: April Fools - Word Shuffler
april_fools_word_shuffler.description: Shuffles or scrambles player chat for a humorous effect on April Fools.

auto_troll.title: Auto-Troll
auto_troll.description: Performs funny or unexpected actions automatically on players.

beep_on_join.title: Beep On Join
beep_on_join.description: Plays a beep sound when a new player joins the server.

capture_the_flag.title: Capture The Flag
capture_the_flag.description: Players try to capture the enemy flag while defending their own.

color_changer.title: Color Changer
color_changer.description: Allows changing player or vehicle colors dynamically.

color_reservation.title: Color Reservation
color_reservation.description: Reserves selected colors for specific players to avoid conflicts.

custom_teleports.title: Custom Teleports
custom_teleports.description: Players can teleport to predefined or custom locations on the map.

damage_multiplier.title: Damage Multiplier
damage_multiplier.description: Change how much damage weapons or abilities deal.

deployable_mines.title: Deployable Mines
deployable_mines.description: Players can place mines on the map to ambush opponents.

expressions.title: Expressions
expressions.description: Players can display or trigger visual/emote expressions in-game.

flashlight_vehicle_entry.title: Flashlight-Vehicle-Entry
flashlight_vehicle_entry.description: Activates flashlight automatically when players enter vehicles.

flip_a_coin.title: Flip a Coin
flip_a_coin.description: Players can flip a virtual coin to make decisions.

flying_vehicles.title: Flying Vehicles
flying_vehicles.description: Allows vehicles to fly temporarily for fun or tactical advantage.

force_chat.title: Force-Chat
force_chat.description: Forces players or server to display custom messages in chat.

gravity_gun.title: Gravity Gun
gravity_gun.description: Pick up, throw, or manipulate objects with gravity-based mechanics.

grenade_launcher.title: Grenade Launcher
grenade_launcher.description: Players can fire grenades with area-of-effect damage for tactical advantage.

headshot_blocker.title: Headshot Blocker
headshot_blocker.description: Blocks critical hits to make gameplay more forgiving.

health_regeneration.title: Health Regeneration
health_regeneration.description: Players regain health automatically after taking damage or over intervals.

items_from_heaven.title: Items from Heaven
items_from_heaven.description: Drops weapons or power-ups from the sky for players to collect.

kill_counter.title: Kill Counter
kill_counter.description: Displays or logs the number of kills for each player in real time.

killer_reward.title: Killer Reward
killer_reward.description: Rewards players with items, points, or perks after eliminating opponents.

market_account_saving.title: Market (with Account Saving)
market_account_saving.description: Players can buy items, and their inventory is saved across sessions.

market_no_account_saving.title: Market (no account saving)
market_no_account_saving.description: Players can buy items, but inventory resets each session.

melee_kicker.title: Melee Kicker
melee_kicker.description: Allows melee attacks to knock back or eject opponents from areas.

mvp_join_alerts.title: MVP Join Alerts
mvp_join_alerts.description: Notifies everyone when a high-performing player joins the server.

player_vanish.title: Player Vanish
player_vanish.description: Temporarily hides a player from others for stealth or fun.

portal_gun_type_1.title: Portal Gun (type 1)
portal_gun_type_1.description: Players can shoot portals to instantly travel between two points.

portal_gun_type_2.title: Portal Gun (type 2)
portal_gun_type_2.description: Variation of portal travel with unique behaviors or limitations.

proximity_chat.title: Proximity Chat
proximity_chat.description: Messages are only heard by nearby players, simulating realistic proximity.

rage_quit.title: Rage Quit
rage_quit.description: Triggers a reaction or logs when a player leaves in anger.

random_fact_generator.title: Random Fact Generator
random_fact_generator.description: Shows random facts or info to players periodically.

random_name.title: Random Name
random_name.description: Assigns random or funny names to players for variety.

rcon_chat.title: RCON Chat
rcon_chat.description: Allows administrators to send messages to the server remotely.

replace_weapon_projectile.title: Replace Weapon Projectile
replace_weapon_projectile.description: Changes the behavior or type of projectiles fired by weapons.

rocket_launcher_malfunction.title: Rocket Launcher Malfunction
rocket_launcher_malfunction.description: Causes rocket launchers to occasionally behave unpredictably for fun.

roll_the_dice.title: Roll-The-Dice
roll_the_dice.description: Applies random buffs, debuffs, or events when a dice is rolled.

self_destruction.title: Self-Destruction
self_destruction.shortDescription: Destroy your own vehicle or player
self_destruction.description: Allows self-elimination of a player or vehicle, optionally with a timer.

server_fun_plus.title: Server Fun Plus
server_fun_plus.description: Adds entertaining mechanics or events for server enjoyment.

shield_regen.title: Shield Regen
shield_regen.description: Automatically regenerates player shields gradually or after avoiding damage.

spawn_from_sky.title: Spawn From Sky
spawn_from_sky.description: Players appear dropping from above instead of normal spawn points.

spawn_protection.title: Spawn Protection
spawn_protection.description: Players are immune to damage briefly after spawning to prevent spawn killing.

spawn_where_killed.title: Spawn Where Killed
spawn_where_killed.description: Players respawn at the location they died instead of default points.

sprint_system.title: Sprint System
sprint_system.description: Adds a stamina-based sprint mechanic to players.

stun_grenades.title: Stun Grenades
stun_grenades.description: Deploy grenades that temporarily disorient or slow opponents.

super_bloodgulch.title: Super Bloogulch
super_bloodgulch.description: Enables a unique enhanced mode with exaggerated player abilities.

super_jump.title: Super Jump
super_jump.description: Players gain enhanced jump height and distance for fun or mobility.

tactical_airstrike.title: Tactical Airstrike
tactical_airstrike.description: Call in precision airstrikes on specific locations or players.

tactical_insertion.title: Tactical Insertion
tactical_insertion.description: Allows players to respawn at custom strategic points instead of default spawn locations.

taunt_on_end_messages.title: Taunt OnGameEnd (messages)
taunt_on_end_messages.description: Automatically sends taunts to players when the game ends.

taunt_your_players.title: Taunt Your Players
taunt_your_players.description: Displays funny or provocative messages to players in-game.

taunt_your_players_v2.title: Taunt Your Players (v2.0)
taunt_your_players_v2.description: Sends humorous or teasing messages to players during the game.

tea_bagging.title: Tea Bagging
tea_bagging.description: Allows players to perform the infamous 'tea bag' action in-game.

truce.title: Truce
truce.description: Disables combat between players for a short duration to enforce a truce.

uber_taxi.title: Uber (TAXI)
uber_taxi.description: Players can summon or ride vehicles as if using a taxi service.

vanish_lurker.title: Vanish (LURKER)
vanish_lurker.description: Players become invisible or undetectable to others temporarily.

weapon_durability_jam_system.title: Weapon Durability & Jam System
weapon_durability_jam_system.description: Weapons can degrade or jam after repeated use, requiring maintenance.

weighted_weapons.title: Weighted Weapons
weighted_weapons.description: Changes movement speed or handling based on equipped weapons.

mode_destroy_gun.title: [MODE] Destroy Gun
mode_destroy_gun.description: A custom mode where guns have destructive or altered behavior.

mode_enter_gun.title: [MODE] Enter Gun
mode_enter_gun.description: Players start with a specific gun in a unique mode.

mode_spawn_gun.title: [MODE] Spawn Gun
mode_spawn_gun.description: Automatically gives players guns on spawn for a custom game mode.

attrition.title: Attrition
attrition.description: Players compete in teams, aiming to reduce the opposing team's numbers to zero.

cranked.title: Cranked
cranked.description: Players gain speed and urgency after each kill, encouraging constant action.

divide_and_conquer.title: Divide & Conquer
divide_and_conquer.description: Teams capture zones and outmaneuver opponents to control the map.

frag_nation.title: Frag Nation
frag_nation.description: Players rack up points by eliminating enemies in a free-for-all or team setting.

gun_game.title: Gun Game
gun_game.description: Players progress through a series of weapons with each kill, aiming to reach the final weapon first.

hunter_prey.title: Hunter-Prey
hunter_prey.description: One team hunts while the other team tries to survive or complete objectives.

juggernaut.title: Juggernaut
juggernaut.description: One player becomes the Juggernaut with enhanced abilities, while others try to take them down.

kill_confirmed.title: Kill Confirmed
kill_confirmed.description: Players must collect fallen enemies' tags to score points for their team.

melee_attack.title: Melee Attack
melee_attack.description: Players can only eliminate opponents using melee attacks, emphasizing agility and timing.

needles_galore.title: Needles Galore
needles_galore.description: Players exclusively use Needlers to score kills and dominate the map.

one_in_the_chamber.title: One In The Chamber
one_in_the_chamber.description: Players have only one bullet per life, making every shot critical.

parkour_timer.title: Parkour Timer
parkour_timer.description: Players race through parkour challenges while being timed, aiming for fastest completion.

sabotage.title: Sabotage
sabotage.description: Players aim to destroy objectives or equipment while preventing the opposing team from doing the same.

shotty_snipes.title: Shotty-Snipes
shotty_snipes.description: Players alternate between shotguns and sniper rifles, testing versatility and positioning.

survival_slayer.title: Survival Slayer
survival_slayer.description: Teams fight until one survives; focus is on endurance and strategic elimination.

swat.title: Swat
swat.description: Players face off with increased damage and no shields, emphasizing accuracy and tactics.

tag.title: Tag
tag.description: Players try to tag opponents or avoid being tagged, turning the map into a giant playground.

team_defender.title: Team Defender
team_defender.description: Teams defend their area while attempting to capture or attack opposing zones.

admin_add_me.title: Admin Add Me
admin_add_me.description: Allows authorized users to automatically grant themselves admin privileges.

admin_chat.title: Admin Chat
admin_chat.shortDescription: Custom chat channel for server admins
admin_chat.description: Toggleable admin-only chat system for communication among server administrators.

admin_messages.title: Admin Messages
admin_messages.description: Announces a special message to all players when a VIP admin joins the server.

afk_system.title: AFK System
afk_system.description: Monitors player activity and automatically kicks players who remain AFK beyond a configurable threshold.

anti_aimbot.title: Anti Aimbot
anti_aimbot.description: Monitors player accuracy and suspicious aiming patterns to identify and mitigate aimbot usage.

anti_camp_v1.title: Anti-Camp V1
anti_camp_v1.description: Detects players camping in restricted areas and applies warnings or penalties.

anti_camp_v2.title: Anti-Camp V2
anti_camp_v2.description: Enhanced camping detection with configurable zones, timers, and punishments.

anti_impersonator.title: Anti Impersonator
anti_impersonator.shortDescription: Prevent players from impersonating clan/community members
anti_impersonator.description: Detects and removes players attempting to impersonate trusted members, supporting kick/ban and logging.

auto_lead.title: Auto Lead
auto_lead.description: Automatically toggles SAPP's lead mode based on specified map and game type configurations

auto_message.title: Auto Message
auto_message.description: Automatically sends configurable messages to all players at set intervals.

auto_team_balance.title: Auto Team Balance
auto_team_balance.description: Reassigns players to maintain even teams based on player count and skill levels.

ban_on_sight.title: Ban On Sight
ban_on_sight.description: Allows admins to immediately ban players upon detection or suspicion of rule violations.

block_duplicate_ips.title: Block Duplicate IPs
block_duplicate_ips.shortDescription: Prevent multiple connections from same IP
block_duplicate_ips.description: Blocks new connections if the IP is already connected, useful to prevent multi-clienting or alt accounts.

block_replace_objects.title: Block or Replace Objects
block_replace_objects.description: Blocks or replaces unwanted in-game objects to maintain map integrity or prevent exploits.

block_team_damage.title: Block Team Damage
block_team_damage.description: Prevents players from damaging teammates, configurable per team or globally.

chat_ids.title: Chat IDs
chat_ids.description: Shows player IDs in the chat for easier identification.

clear_chat.title: Clear Chat
clear_chat.description: Clears the server chat for all players instantly.

client_crasher.title: Client Crasher
client_crasher.description: This tool will crash clients to the desktop

command_spy.title: Command Spy
command_spy.description: This tool will spy on player commands

console_logo.title: Console Logo
console_logo.description: Shows a custom ASCII logo in the server console upon startup.

countdown_timer.title: Countdown Timer
countdown_timer.description: Displays a configurable countdown timer to players for events or map changes.

custom_colors.title: Custom Colors
custom_colors.description: Allows modification of in-game colors for players or teams.

custom_command_cooldowns.title: Custom Command Cooldowns
custom_command_cooldowns.description: Configurable cooldown periods for commands to prevent spam or abuse.

custom_loadouts.title: Custom Loadouts
custom_loadouts.description: Players receive predefined weapon or equipment loadouts upon spawn or command execution.

custom_vehicle_spawner.title: Custom Vehicle Spawner
custom_vehicle_spawner.description: Replaces default vehicle spawns with custom locations and configurations.

custom_wdel.title: Custom Object Deleter
custom_wdel.description: Modified weapon deletion that preserves flag/oddball items

damage_multiplier_changer.title: Damage Multiplier (Changer)
damage_multiplier_changer.description: Admins can modify the damage multiplier for all players or specific teams, useful for balancing gameplay.

delay_skip.title: Delay Skip
delay_skip.shortDescription: Prevent players from skipping the map too early
delay_skip.description: Prevents players from skipping the map too early, useful for custom game modes.

disable_fall_damage.title: Disable Fall Damage
disable_fall_damage.shortDescription: Prevent players from taking fall damage
disable_fall_damage.description: Disables fall damage globally or for specific players, useful for custom game modes.

dynamic_ping_kicker.title: Dynamic Ping Kicker
dynamic_ping_kicker.description: Monitors player ping and kicks players who exceed a configurable threshold, reducing lag for others.

dynamic_score_limit.title: Dynamic Score Limit
dynamic_score_limit.description: Automatically adjusts the score limit based on player count or other factors.

freeze_players.title: Freeze Players
freeze_players.description: Admins can freeze selected players or entire teams, preventing movement or actions.

game_countdown.title: Game Countdown
game_countdown.description: Displays a configurable countdown timer to signal the start of a match or event.

get_object_identity.title: Get Object Identity
get_object_identity.description: Displays the internal IDs and properties of objects in the game world for debugging or scripting.

get_server_name.title: Get Server Name (Example)
get_server_name.description: Demonstrates retrieving the server name programmatically for logging or display purposes.

item_sky_spawner.title: Item Sky Spawner
item_sky_spawner.description: Spawns objects or items from above the map at configurable intervals or locations.

kill_zones.title: Kill Zones
kill_zones.description: Creates designated areas where players instantly die or take damage, for map control or game modes.

list_players.title: List Players
list_players.description: Shows a list of currently connected players with IDs, teams, and statuses.

live_on_3.title: Live on 3
live_on_3.description: Announces a 'Live on 3' countdown to signal the start of a game or match.

map_vote_system.title: Map Vote System
map_vote_system.shortDescription: Allow players to vote for next map
map_vote_system.description: Players vote for the next map using a menu or chat commands, with results applied automatically.

mapcycle_manager.title: Mapcycle Manager
mapcycle_manager.description: Manages map cycles with automatic transitions and voting overrides.

multiclient_detector.title: MultiClient Detector
multiclient_detector.description: Identifies players connected from multiple clients to prevent cheating or exploits.

mute_system.title: Mute System
mute_system.description: Admins can mute individual players or entire teams, blocking messages from appearing in chat.

name_ban.title: Name Ban
name_ban.shortDescription: Prevent players from using banned names
name_ban.description: Blocks players from using offensive or restricted names, optionally kicking or banning them.

name_replacer.title: Name Replacer
name_replacer.description: Renames players in real-time based on configured rules to maintain community standards.

notify_me.title: Notify Me
notify_me.description: Sends notifications to admins for specific events such as player joins, map changes, or rule violations.

on_teleport.title: OnTeleport
on_teleport.description: Executes configurable actions when a player teleports, useful for event handling or logging.

ping_checker.title: Ping Checker
ping_checker.description: Periodically checks player ping and logs or warns high-latency connections.

play_time.title: Play Time
play_time.description: Records and displays how long each player has been active on the server.

random_grenades.title: Random Grenades
random_grenades.description: Randomly spawns grenades on the map to increase chaos or fun in custom game modes.

remove_grenades.title: Remove Grenades (On Spawn)
remove_grenades.description: Removes grenades immediately after spawn to prevent map clutter or unbalanced gameplay.

restart_mapcycle.title: Restart Mapcycle
restart_mapcycle.description: Resets the mapcycle to the first map, optionally applying any voting overrides.

score_handler.title: Score Handler
score_handler.description: Tracks, modifies, and displays player scores with configurable rules and multipliers.

script_manager.title: Script Manager
script_manager.description: Admin utility to manage active scripts, reload changes, and debug script issues in real-time.

server_logger.title: Server Logger
server_logger.description: Records server events such as joins, leaves, kills, and commands to files for auditing or analytics.

server_name_changer.title: Server Name Changer
server_name_changer.description: Allows admins to change the server name on the fly, useful for events or branding.

set_respawn_time.title: Set Respawn Time
set_respawn_time.description: Admins can configure respawn timers globally or per team to modify gameplay pacing.

show_admin_names.title: Show Admin Names
show_admin_names.description: Lists currently connected admins in chat or via command for transparency.

simple_poll_system.title: Simple Poll System
simple_poll_system.description: Allows players to vote on options, with results displayed in chat.

spawn_protection.title: Spawn Protection
spawn_protection.description: Grants temporary invincibility to players after spawning to reduce unfair deaths.

status_timer.title: Status Timer
status_timer.description: Displays or logs timers for statuses such as buffs, debuffs, or cooldowns.

suicide_punisher.title: Suicide Punisher
suicide_punisher.description: Applies penalties for players who repeatedly kill themselves to prevent exploits or griefing.

suspend_players.title: Suspend Players
suspend_players.description: Allows admins to suspend player actions, including movement, chat, and attacks, for a configurable duration.

sync_admins.title: Sync Admins
sync_admins.description: Ensures all servers in a network have updated admin lists and permissions.

sync_your_files.title: Sync Your Files
sync_your_files.description: Uploads or updates scripts on the server to match a local repository or file set.

t_slayer_team_spawns.title: T-Slayer Team Spawns
t_slayer_team_spawns.description: Sets custom spawn locations for T-Slayer or similar team-based modes.

team_chat.title: Team Chat
team_chat.description: Enables a separate chat channel for teams, invisible to opponents.

team_color_voting.title: Team Color Voting
team_color_voting.description: Allows players to vote for team colors before match start, applied automatically.

team_shuffler.title: Team Shuffler
team_shuffler.description: Randomly assigns players to teams to maintain fairness and variety in matches.

teleport_manager.title: Teleport Manager
teleport_manager.description: Admins can teleport players individually, in groups, or to preset locations.

the_punisher.title: The Punisher
the_punisher.description: Implements automatic punishments for players breaking configurable rules, including kicks, bans, and score penalties.

vehicle_blocker_v1.title: Vehicle Blocker v1
vehicle_blocker_v1.description: Blocks specific vehicles from spawning or being used, configurable by admin.

vehicle_blocker_v2.title: Vehicle Blocker v2
vehicle_blocker_v2.description: Enhanced vehicle blocking with additional options, such as team-specific or temporary blocks.

vote_kick.title: Vote Kick
vote_kick.description: Allows players to initiate votes to kick disruptive players, with configurable thresholds.

vpn_blocker.title: VPN Blocker
vpn_blocker.description: Blocks or warns players connecting via VPN to prevent evasion of bans or multi-accounting.

weapon_assigner.title: Weapon Assigner
weapon_assigner.description: Automatically provides players with specific weapons on spawn or via command.

welcome_messages.title: Welcome Messages
welcome_messages.description: Sends personalized welcome messages to players when they join the server.

word_buster.title: Word Buster
word_buster.description: Advanced multi-lingual chat filter. Detects and removes offensive or banned words in chat messages, optionally replacing them.
